response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I understand its worth to you is $15,000. My offer to you is to purchase this product for $12,000. This represents a substantial saving for you while ensuring a fair return for us. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction.", "product_price": 12000}
